meanings.definition: In a grumpy or irritable manner
meanings.sent1: She answered grouchily when asked about her day.
meanings.sent2: He walked grouchily to the store after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed grouchily when it didn't get its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved grouchily across the sky, threatening rain.
meanings.sent5: The old man muttered grouchily to himself as he fixed his glasses.

meanings.definition: Showing or expressing annoyance or dissatisfaction
meanings.sent1: The grouchily teacher scolded the students for being late.
meanings.sent2: She gave a grouchily look when her order was wrong.
meanings.sent3: The grouchily customer complained about the slow service.
meanings.sent4: The grouchily dog barked at the mailman every morning.
meanings.sent5: His grouchily expression made it clear he was not in a good mood.
